org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces

Interface UriBuilderFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TavernaServerBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomFeed, TavernaServer

    public interface UriBuilderFactory
    How to manufacture URIs to workflow runs.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder getBaseUriBuilder() 
      javax.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder getRunUriBuilder(TavernaRun run)
      Given a run, get a factory for RESTful URIs to resources associated with it.
      String resolve(String uri)
      Resolves a URI with respect to the base URI of the factory.

    • Method Detail

      • getRunUriBuilder

        javax.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder getRunUriBuilder(TavernaRun run)
        Given a run, get a factory for RESTful URIs to resources associated with it.
        Parameters:
        run - The run in question.
        Returns:
        The URI factory.

      • getBaseUriBuilder

        javax.ws.rs.core.UriBuilder getBaseUriBuilder()
        Returns:
        a URI factory that is preconfigured to point to the base of the webapp.

      • resolve

        String resolve(String uri)
        Resolves a URI with respect to the base URI of the factory.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to resolve, or null.
        Returns:
        The resolved URI, or null if uri is null.
